cont.entity_a: Full-featured. Great for beginners and offers room to grow.
cont.entity_b: Relatively easy to use with obvious controls. Easy to operate with excellent picture results.

cont.entity_a: Great for small prints but not suitable for poster-sized prints due to lower megapixels.
cont.entity_b: Provides vivid colors and terrific clarity. May not compare to newer smartphones.

cont.entity_a: Lenses are interchangeable with most F-mount Nikons. Compatible with 2GB or smaller SD cards. Compatible with older Nikkor AF lenses.
cont.entity_b: Accepts older Minolta lenses. Compatibility with Minolta gear, including lenses and flashes. Full-sized CCD allows use of Sony or Konica-Minolta lenses.

Features.comm: Offers many features needed by experienced users.

cont.entity_a: Dedicated buttons for ISO and White Balance offer easy access. Some features like Black and White mode and an illuminated display are missing.
cont.entity_b: Anti-shake feature in the camera makes lenses cheaper and enhances usability. The anti-shake feature allows for sharp pictures even with low shutter speeds. The image stabilization feature makes it hard to mess up a shot.

cont.entity_a: Offers great value for the price.
cont.entity_b: The camera is a great value DSLR with many manual controls.

cont.entity_a: Outstanding handling and service by the seller.
cont.entity_b: The camera is easy to handle and offers many advanced features. The camera has a compact, easy-to-handle body and offers high performance.

cont.entity_a: The flash didn't work and was not disclosed, and it didn't come with a battery. Some cameras have issues with underexposed pictures and non-working external flashes. The camera stopped working after a month for some users. Some cameras have broken aperture mechanisms that are costly to fix. Some users experienced issues with the camera not reading current memory cards.
cont.entity_b: Sony's proprietary hot shoe limits compatibility with other flash systems. The camera has been discontinued but remains a solid entry-level option. Missing CF card and incompatible USB cable were issues for some users. Some users experienced issues with the camera not taking pictures in windy conditions.

cont.entity_a: High quality camera with great clarity, speed, ease of use, and picture quality.
cont.entity_b: Camera performs well even in low light.
Long battery life is a notable feature.
